<style>
/* Container 2 cột */
.section-team-member {
  display: flex;
  justify-content: center;
  align-items: flex-start;
  gap: 40px;
  padding: 40px 20px;
}

/* Cột ảnh */
.section-team-member .profile-pic-wrapper {
  flex: 0 0 280px;
  position: sticky;
  top: 100px;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateX(-50px);
  animation: slideInLeft 1s ease forwards;
}
@keyframes slideInLeft {
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
}

/* Ảnh */
.section-team-member .profile-pic {
  width: 100%;
  border-radius: 16px; /* bo góc nhẹ giống Bevel Rectangle */
  padding: 6px; /* tạo khoảng viền */
  background: linear-gradient(145deg, #ffffff, #c9c9c9); /* gradient sáng - tối mô phỏng bevel */
  
  box-shadow: inset 3px 3px 6px rgba(0,0,0,0.2),   /* bóng trong tối */
              inset -3px -3px 6px rgba(255,255,255,0.7), /* bóng trong sáng */
              4px 4px 10px rgba(0,0,0,0.3); /* bóng ngoài nhẹ */
  
  transition: transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
}

.section-team-member .profile-pic:hover {
  transform: scale(1.05);
  box-shadow: inset 2px 2px 5px rgba(0,0,0,0.25),
              inset -2px -2px 5px rgba(255,255,255,0.8),
              6px 6px 14px rgba(0,0,0,0.4);
}

/* Cột nội dung */
.section-team-member .profile-content {
  flex: 1;
  max-width: 700px;
  background: #ffffff;
  border-radius: 16px;
  box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,0.1);
  padding: 25px;
  line-height: 1.7;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateX(50px);
  animation: slideInRight 1s ease forwards;
  animation-delay: 0.3s;
}
@keyframes slideInRight {
  to { opacity: 1; transform: translateX(0); }
}

/* Tên chuyên gia: highlight + căn giữa */
.section-team-member .profile-content h2 {
  margin-top: 0;
  color: #313d5d;
  font-size: 1.8em;
  font-weight: bold;
  border-bottom: 2px solid #1265c9;
  padding-bottom: 10px;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  text-align: center;
}

/* Văn bản: căn đều, không có background chữ */
.section-team-member .profile-content p {
  color: #444;
  font-size: 1em;
  margin-bottom: 20px;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
  transition: opacity 0.8s ease, transform 0.8s ease;
  text-align: justify;
}
.section-team-member .profile-content p.glow {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
}
.section-team-member .profile-content p:nth-of-type(1).glow { transition-delay: 0.2s; }
.section-team-member .profile-content p:nth-of-type(2).glow { transition-delay: 0.5s; }
.section-team-member .profile-content p:nth-of-type(3).glow { transition-delay: 0.8s; }

/* Icons: căn giữa */
.section-team-member .contact-icons {
  margin-top: 20px;
  text-align: center;
  opacity: 0;
  transform: translateY(20px);
  transition: opacity 0.8s ease, transform 0.8s ease;
}
.section-team-member .contact-icons.glow {
  opacity: 1;
  transform: translateY(0);
  transition-delay: 1.2s;
}
.section-team-member .contact-icons a {
  margin: 0 10px;
  font-size: 1.6em;
  color: #313d5d;
  transition: color 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease;
}
.section-team-member .contact-icons a:hover {
  color: #1265c9;
  transform: scale(1.2);
}

/* Nút quay lại: căn giữa */
.section-team-member .back-btn {
  display: block;
  margin: 25px auto 0; /* căn giữa */
  padding: 12px 22px;
  background: #313d5d;
  color: #fff;
  border-radius: 8px;
  font-size: 1em;
  text-decoration: none;
  transition: background 0.3s ease, transform 0.3s ease, box-shadow 0.3s ease;
  text-align: center;
  width: fit-content;
}
.section-team-member .back-btn:hover {
  background: #1265c9;
  transform: translateY(-3px);
  box-shadow: 0 5px 15px rgba(18, 101, 201, 0.4);
}

/* Responsive */
@media (max-width: 900px) {
  .section-team-member {
    flex-direction: column;
    align-items: center;
  }
  .section-team-member .profile-pic-wrapper {
    position: relative;
    top: auto;
    margin-bottom: 20px;
    width: 60%;
  }
  .section-team-member .profile-content {
    width: 100%;
  }
}
</style>

<script>
// Parallax effect
window.addEventListener("scroll", function() {
  const pic = document.getElementById("expert-pic");
  const offset = window.scrollY * 0.0015; 
  pic.style.transform = `scale(${1 + offset})`;
});

// Glow on scroll
const observer = new IntersectionObserver(entries => {
  entries.forEach(entry => {
    if (entry.isIntersecting) {
      entry.target.classList.add("glow");
    }
  });
}, { threshold: 0.2 });

document.querySelectorAll(".profile-content p, .contact-icons, #expert-pic")
  .forEach(el => observer.observe(el));
</script>
